features.additionalInfo: Access your money with a Bankwest Debit Card.

Have easy access to your money with a Business Debit Mastercard. It's available to Australian citizens and temporary or permanent residents over 16 with an Australian residential address (limited exceptions may apply subject to conditions).
You can bank over the phone.
You can set up direct debits.

PayTo is a service that's been developed by the NPPA (New Payments Platform Australia) that businesses, service providers and merchants can opt in to. Essentially, it's a digital way for customers to pre-authorise payments from their bank accounts in real time, for things like utilities, subscriptions and memberships.
You can access this account in Bankwest Online Banking (BOB) and the Bankwest App subject to conditions of use.

Enjoy secure Online Business Banking at your fingertips. As a customer on this account you may also be entitled to apply for our Online Business Banking service. If you apply for that service you will be provided with a separate Product Disclosure Statement and your use of the service will be a matter of separate agreement with us. Separate fees are applicable for this service.
Other fees which the Bank charges for its services, including services not specific to this account but for which you may be charged are listed in our Bankwest Your Guide to Banking Fees brochure.
Offers an overdraft facility (minimum $100,000), subject to lending approval and criteria. Fees will apply.
You can set up ongoing payments for things like bills or loan repayments.

The Sweep Facility operates as an automatic periodic transfer of funds only between nominated Bankwest accounts held with us in the same name(s) and capacity(ies). It is governed by the terms of the Sweep Facility authority you give to us.

fees.name: Overseas ATM Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No Bankwest-charged overseas ATM access fees. The overseas bank may charge a fee for using their ATM.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: We will charge a fee equal to 2.95% of the transaction amount for each transaction occurring outside Australia (whether in foreign currency or Australian dollars) posted to your account.

fees.name: Paper Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No paper transaction fees apply to this product.

fees.name: Electronic Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No electronic transaction fees apply to this product.

fees.name: Overdrawn Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Overdrawn Notice Fee. This fee applies when your account is overdrawn without prior authorisation (ie there are insufficient funds or an authorised credit limit is exceeded), Bankwest elects to honour (pay) the transaction which overdraws your account and issues you with an Overdrawn Notice. Each Overdrawn Notice issued will incur a $45.00 fee.

fees.name: Honour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A $10.00 Honour Fee will apply when one or more transactions overdraw the account, Bankwest elects to honour (pay) the transaction(s), and Bankwest does not issue an Overdrawn Notice. A transaction will be taken to overdraw your account if it causes the balance to exceed the funds available in your account.

fees.name: Outward Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A $10.00 Outward Dishonour Fee will be charged to the account where there are insufficient cleared funds in your account to cover a cheque drawn on your account or an authorised debit request made in respect of your account.

fees.name: Inward Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A $10.00 Inward Dishonour Fee will be charged to the account where you deposit a cheque into your account which is not honoured by the financial institution on which the cheque is drawn.

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fees will apply although each fee payable will not exceed the fee shown. These Search Fees are listed in our Bankwest Your Guide to Banking Fees brochure.

fees.name: Cheque Stop Payment
fees.additionalInfo: Fee to stop payment on an issued cheque. This fee is $25 when payment is stopped on a range of cheques.

fees.name: AgriOne Package Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee applies to establish the AgriOne package. The amount of the establishment fee is dependent upon the credit limit you apply for. We will provide details of any other fees, charges and expenses relevant to the establishment of your AgriOne Package at the time of approval.

fees.name: Management Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A quarterly Management Fee $250.00 (minimum) will be charged to the account at the end of March/June/September and December, and on termination if the account is terminated during a quarter.

fees.name: Inward Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: We will charge a fee of $10.00 per transaction for each deposit via the Real Time Gross Settlement System and SWIFT Network.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Credit interest is usually paid monthly to the account; however annual interest payments can be made. We will credit this interest to your account on the last business day of the month. If you request annual interest payments we will credit this interest to you on the last business day of the month you have nominated.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: If an approved overdraft is held in the account, the applicable interest rate is the sum of the AgriOne Overdraft Reference Rate plus a margin dependant on the security offered. Interest is debited to the account on the last business day of each month.

If the debit balance of the account exceeds the available balance, or if the account is overdrawn without prior arrangement, debit interest will be charged at the rate being the aggregate of the AgriOne Overdraft Reference Rate plus 4.50% p.a. Interest is debited to the account on the last business day of each month.

data.name: AgriOne Account
data.description: A transaction account designed for primary producers, which combines with an Overdraft Facility (with a minimum credit limit of $100,000).
